## ObliterateOpts interface

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface ObliterateOpts 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [count?](./bullmq.obliterateopts.count.md) | number | <i>(Optional)</i> Use count with the maximum number of deleted keys per iteration |
|  [force?](./bullmq.obliterateopts.force.md) | boolean | <i>(Optional)</i> Use force = true to force obliteration even with active jobs in the queue |
